analysis.description:
EthereumJackpot.finalizeRoom (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#355-418) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- prizeSendResult = winner.send(prize) (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#396-397)
	- owner.send(ownerComValue) (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#414)

EthereumJackpot.bitMaskForPlayFields (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#173) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- getTickets (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#191-200)
	- clearState (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#223-252)
	- getPlayers (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#261-291)
	- buyTicket (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#420-472)

EthereumJackpot.addWinner (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#493-502) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winners.length == winnersCount

EthereumJackpot.addWinner (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#493-502) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winners.length == winnersCount
Random32BigInteger.generate (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#64-101) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- randomBlockStart[lotteryId] == 0

EthereumJackpot.addWinner (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#493-502) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winners.length == winnersCount
Random32BigInteger.generate (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#64-101) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- randomBlockStart[lotteryId] == 0
EthereumJackpot.roomNeedsFinalization (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#473-484) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (state[lotteryId] == State.Running && (ticketsSold[lotteryId] >= maxTickets[lotteryId]) && ((randomBlockStart[lotteryId] == 0) || ((randomBlockStart[lotteryId] > 0) && (block.number - randomBlockStart[lotteryId]) >= 32)))
i in EthereumJackpot.buyTicket (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#448) is a local variable never initialiazed

EthereumJackpot.refund has external calls inside a loop:
	- sendResult = tOwner.send(value) (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#324-326)

EthereumJackpot.refund (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#293-337) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender == owner || playerInfoMappings[lotteryId][msg.sender].changedOn > started[lotteryId]) (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#306-309)
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > (started[lotteryId] + lifetime[lotteryId])) (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#298)

EthereumJackpot.buyTicket (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#420-472) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)((pInfo.ticketsCount + ticketsToBuy) <= ((maxTickets[lotteryId] * maxPercentPerPlayer) / 100)) (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#444-447)

EthereumJackpot.addWinner (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#493-502) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- winners.length == winnersCount (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#499-500)

EthereumJackpot.affiliatePercent should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#143-144)
EthereumJackpot.maxPercentPerPlayer should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#144-146)
EthereumJackpot.ownerComission should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#146-147)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#89-91:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
EthereumJackpot.pauseLottery (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#185-189) should be declared external
EthereumJackpot.setOwner (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#189-191) should be declared external
EthereumJackpot.getTickets (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#191-200) should be declared external
EthereumJackpot.setLotteryOptions (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#200-221) should be declared external
EthereumJackpot.refund (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#293-337) should be declared external
EthereumJackpot.buyTicket (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#420-472) should be declared external
EthereumJackpot.getWinners (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#515-543) should be declared external
EthereumJackpot.getRomms (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#543-573) should be declared external
EthereumJackpot.destroy (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#580-587) should be declared external
EthereumJackpot.needsFinalization (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol) should be declared external
EthereumJackpot.finalize (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#1): it allows old versions
Function 'EthereumJackpot.EthereumJackpot' (/unique_contracts/0x957cf177fd2777f062b63bbf0661facf99c9391c.sol#484-492) is not in mixedCase
